EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Data Science Tech Workshops_Q3-416.TYFA - General content for EU
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending our Data Science Technical Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B5WoKS8mubyjVFFQQ3dacVRfMXM/view]]> Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for attending our Data Science Technical Workshop. We hope you found it enjoyable and informative as you explore your Big Data technology options for data science.
Now that you have a taste of what is possible with Pivotal Greenplum and Apache MADlib (incubating), we invite you to join the Greenplum Database community <[[http://greenplum.org/]]>. Here you can download the Pivotal Greenplum Sandbox (which includes Apache MADlib (incubating)) and access helpful tutorials.
Also, take advantage of our Big Data and analytics resources including:
- Sarah Aerni Data Science workshop presentation <[[https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B5WoKS8mubyjVFFQQ3dacVRfMXM/view]]> - Blog posts related to Pivotal Data Science <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/tag/data-science]]> - eBook: Shaping the Future of Data Warehousing through Open Source Software <[[http://pivotal.io/shaping-the-future-of-data-warehousing-through-open-source-software]]> - Case Study: Aridhia Powers Next-Gen Clinical Analytics Platform with Pivotal Greenplum <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/case-study/powering-the-next-generation-of-clinical-and-translational-informatics]]> - Webinar on-demand: Insights to Action: How to Transform Your Business with Smart Applications <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/how-to-transform-your-business-with-smart-applications]]>
If you would like more information or have any questions about Big Data and Data Science, submit your question here <[[mailto:EMEA_ISR@pivotal.io]]>.
Kind Regards,
The Pivotal Team
